DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate performance new voice prosthesis comparison Provox2 Provox ActiValve voice prosthesis 15 laryngectomized patient . Factors take account clinician patient satisfaction insertion system , patient satisfaction voice , speech , performance , maintenance . Voice speech also evaluate different prosthesis mean perceptual evaluation acoustic analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Clinical Feasibility New Provox Vega 22.5 Voice Prosthesis
DOC.criteria: Total laryngectomy Use Provox ActiValve Current problem TE puncture
